relevant_findings.general: in no acute distress, well-appearing and well-nourished
relevant_findings.HEENT: mucus membranes moist, nares clear, trachea at midline
relevant_findings.CV: regular rate, rhythm. No appreciable murmurs, rubs, gallops
relevant_findings.Abd: scaphoid, non-distended. No hernias, masses or incisions. Focally tender in RLQ with rebound tenderness and involuntary guarding. + Rosving's sign.
relevant_findings.Neuro: alert, oriented to person, place, time
